home.title: Color Hut | Creative Agency - Graphics, Web, Marketing & More
home.description: Transform your brand with Color Hut's premium creative services. Expert graphics design, web development, digital marketing, photography, videography, and customer support. Serving clients globally and across Bangladesh.
home.keywords: creative agency Bangladesh, graphics design services, web development agency, digital marketing Bangladesh, professional photography, video production, brand identity design
home.ogTitle: Color Hut - Your Creative Partner for Digital Success
home.ogDescription: Premium creative services including graphics design, web development, digital marketing, and more. Trusted by businesses worldwide.

services.title: Our Services | Graphics, Web, Marketing & Creative Solutions
services.description: Explore Color Hut's comprehensive creative services: Brand Identity Design, Web & App Development, Digital Marketing Strategy, Video Production, Professional Photography, and Customer Support Solutions.
services.keywords: creative services, brand identity design, web app development, digital marketing strategy, video production, professional photography, customer support
services.ogDescription: From brand identity to digital marketing, we offer complete creative solutions for your business growth.

meeting.title: Book a Meeting | Color Hut Creative Consultation
meeting.description: Schedule a free consultation with Color Hut's creative experts. Discuss your project requirements and get a customized solution for your business needs.
meeting.keywords: book consultation, creative consultation, project discussion, free meeting, business consultation
meeting.ogTitle: Book Your Free Consultation - Color Hut
meeting.ogDescription: Get expert advice on your creative projects. Schedule a meeting with our team today.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy | Color Hut Creative Agency
privacy.description: Read Color Hut's privacy policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your personal information and data.
privacy.keywords: privacy policy, data protection, personal information, GDPR compliance
privacy.ogDescription: Your privacy matters. Learn how we protect your data and respect your privacy.

refund.title: Refund Policy | Color Hut Terms & Conditions
refund.description: Review Color Hut's refund and cancellation policy. Understand our terms for service delivery, payments, and refund procedures.
refund.keywords: refund policy, cancellation policy, terms and conditions, payment terms
refund.ogDescription: Transparent refund and cancellation terms for all our creative services.
